title: I live in new Hanover county not the city of Wilmington . My neighbor has not cut their grass in overs month . I am worried abou bugs and mice, snakes, coming into my yard . Is there something I can do or a number I can call to complain about it. Thank u
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/my-neighbors-house-and-yard-is-in-hideous-disrepair-whom-can-i-call/
